```{r}
library(GGally)
```

### Loading dataset

The first step will be to load the dataset to a variable to access easily to the inside data.

```{r}
dataset <- read.csv("./datasets/insurance.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(dataset)
```

```{r}
hist(dataset$expenses)
```

```{r}
pairs(dataset[c("age", "bmi", "children", "expenses")])
```

```{r}
plot(dataset)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(dataset)
```

```{r}
ggplot(dataset, aes(expenses)) +
  geom_density()
```

```{r}
m <- lm(dataset$expenses ~ ., data = dataset)
print(m)
summary(m)
```

```{r}
r <- log(dataset$expenses)
print(r)
dataset$sex2 <- r
```
